    public static final java.lang.String CLOCK_IN "INSERT INTO APP.TIME_PUNCH (EMPLOYEE_ID,PUNCH_IN_TIME) VALUES(?,?)"

    public static final java.lang.String CREATE_EMPLOYEE "CREATE table APP.EMPLOYEES (EMPLOYEE_ID INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1001, INCREMENT BY 1), FIRST_NAME VARCHAR(30), LAST_NAME VARCHAR(30), IS_SALARY SMALLINT DEFAULT 0, IS_ADMIN SMALLINT DEFAULT 0, PASSWORD VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL,PUNCH_STAT SMALLINT DEFAULT 0) "
    public static final java.lang.String CREATE_TIME_PUNCH "CREATE table APP.TIME_PUNCH (PUNCH_ID INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), EMPLOYEE_ID INT NOT NULL, PUNCH_IN_TIME TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, PUNCH_OUT_TIME TIMESTAMP)"
    public static final java.lang.String DELETE_EMPLOYEE "DELETE FROM APP.EMPLOYEES WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID = ? AND FIRST_NAME = ?"
    public static final java.lang.String DELETE_TIME_PUNCHES "DELETE FROM APP.TIME_PUNCH WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID = ?"

    public static final java.lang.String GET_ALL_CLOCKED_IN "SELECT * FROM APP.EMPLOYEES WHERE PUNCH_STAT = 1"

    public static final java.lang.String GET_ALL_TIME_PUNCHES "SELECT * FROM APP.TIME_PUNCH"
    public static final java.lang.String GET_CLOCKED_IN "SELECT * FROM APP.TIME_PUNCH WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID = ? AND PUNCH_OUT_TIME = null"
    public static final java.lang.String GET_EMPLOYEE_BY_ID "SELECT EMPLOYEE_ID, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, IS_SALARY, IS_ADMIN, PASSWORD FROM APP.EMPLOYEES WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID=?"
    public static final java.lang.String GET_TIME_BY_ID "SELECT * FROM APP.TIME_PUNCH WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID = ? AND PUNCH_IN_TIME BETWEEN ? AND ? AND PUNCH_OUT_TIME BETWEEN ? AND ?"
